titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from the Right Honourable, the Lord Paget, unto the Honourable House of Parliament declaring the reasons of his departure from them, unto the Kings most excellent Majesty at Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Paget, William Paget, Baron, 1609-1678.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Lord Paget = William Paget, Baron Paget.
Place of publication inferred from Wing P170.
Partly in the same setting as Wing P170.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
